sections.heading: What is CyberHero?
sections.content: CyberHero is an educational cybersecurity game that teaches you real hacking techniques in a safe, legal environment. You'll learn penetration testing, network analysis, and ethical hacking through story-driven missions.

sections.heading: How to Play
sections.content: Each mission presents a cybersecurity challenge. You'll use realistic hacking tools through a terminal interface to complete objectives. Follow the mission briefing, use the right tools, and learn as you go!

sections.heading: Game Mechanics
content: • Objectives: Each mission has specific goals to achieve
• Tools: Use VPN, Nmap, packet analyzers, and more
• Hints: Get help when you're stuck
• XP & Progression: Earn experience and unlock new missions

sections.heading: Ethical Hacking
sections.content:
CyberHero teaches ethical hacking - using hacking skills for good. Always remember:

✓ Only test systems you have permission to access
✓ Never cause damage or harm
✓ Protect user privacy and data
✓ Use your skills to improve security, not break it

The tools and techniques you learn are powerful. Use them responsibly!
